The time when Amazon reported that services had returned to normal operations, indicating the duration and resolution timeline of the outage.

keyTakeAways: The AWS outage was caused by a technical error during a software update to DynamoDB’s API, which disrupted the Domain Name System (DNS) and prevented apps from connecting to critical services.
The outage affected 113 AWS services, including major platforms such as Snapchat, Pinterest, WhatsApp, Roblox, Fortnite, Delta Airlines, Venmo, and The New York Times.
The root cause was human error in a DNS configuration update, not a cyberattack or malicious activity, as confirmed by cybersecurity experts.
The outage demonstrated the critical dependency of modern digital infrastructure—such as banking, gaming, smart home devices, and media platforms—on cloud services like AWS.
Despite widespread disruption, AWS engineers resolved the issue quickly, and the company acknowledged the incident with a post-event summary to be published.
The incident underscores the fragility of internet-dependent systems and the importance of robust cloud infrastructure management and fail-safes.

summaryOfNewsArticle: An outage at Amazon Web Services (AWS) on October 20, 2025, began at 07:11 GMT in AWS’s Virginia data center due to a technical error in a DynamoDB API update that disrupted the Domain Name System (DNS), preventing apps from finding server addresses. This led to the failure of 113 AWS services, including Snapchat, Pinterest, WhatsApp, Roblox, Fortnite, Delta Airlines, Venmo, and major news outlets like The New York Times. The incident, which lasted until 10:11 GMT, revealed how deeply modern digital services—ranging from banking and gaming to smart home devices and media—depend on cloud infrastructure. Experts confirmed the issue was human error, not a cyberattack, and AWS quickly restored services, though some users faced message backlogs. The event underscores the fragility of internet-dependent systems and the critical role of robust cloud management in maintaining global digital operations.
title: What caused Amazon’s AWS outage, and why did so many major apps go offline?
